Name: NEUTRANS
About the game: NEUTRANS is a VR collaboration service for business which realizes conversations beyond reality. Sharing the VR space with multiple people, NEUTRANS BIZ activates creativity and interactive communication such as brainstorming and discussion. NEUTRANS can be used for a wide range of business scenes without customization. DISCUSSION In this space, you can discuss with multiple people while showing images, movies, and PDF documents. Also, utilizing the 360Â° image, it is possible to share the reality without being the actual place. BRAINSTORMING With multiple functions such as whiteboard and pen which you can use intuitively, we activate the creative conversation such as brainstorming. Also, you can share the outputs easily by using cameras and saving functions. DESIGN REVIEW Utilizing the 3D data, you can share the visual images which were difficult to convey with words. You can prevent misunderstanding among the multiple people by checking the size and shape sterically in the VR space.
